description: Back-three player Chisholm is a Quins academy product, while scrum-half Mulchrone joined the Aviva Premiership club from Worcester last year.
title: Ross Chisholm and Charlie Mulchrone sign new Harlequins deals
title_page: Ross Chisholm and Charlie Mulchrone sign new Harlequins deals | Daily Mail Online
text:
Harlequins have announced new contracts for backs Ross Chisholm and Charlie Mulchrone.
Back-three player Chisholm is a Quins academy product, while scrum-half Mulchrone joined the Aviva Premiership club from Worcester last year.
Quins rugby director John Kingston said: “It is great news that both Charlie and Ross have agreed to extend their time at Harlequins.
Ross Chisholm (Adam Davy/PA)
“They both complement the environment I am seeking to create within the club.
“They are both real team players who have a significant positive influence on others around them.”
